originalText.text: The older Doctor is amazing and so is Ana but the staff are horrible the don’t answer they have an attitude they don’t help they don’t care about the kids super upsetting.

text.text: The older Doctor is amazing and so is Ana but the staff are horrible the don’t answer they have an attitude they don’t help they don’t care about the kids super upsetting.

originalText.text: I absolutely do not understand the one start reviews on here. I love Dr Tio! He was my first daughters doctor from the moment she was born.. I now moved to PA, had a second child and am having an a terrible time finding a pediatrician I can trust. Dr Tio and his staff are amazing, if you need to been seen the same day you can call between 12p-2p and speak to him directly. You can also walk in any day between 7a and 8a it is sometimes difficult if your not early because since he is such a great doctor a lot of people show up and call just need a bit of patience! But he is absolutely worth any wait.

originalText.text: They don’t care about your nor your child. They’re appointments are so stupid the doctor seems to take his sweet schedules!!! So annoying!! And it’s true the staff hides under there desks with there phones when u walk in. Not only that I call several times and sometimes they don’t pick up. My child’s been absent so many times bc of them. I’m definitely going back to Ryan Chelsea Center. The only reason I choose this doctor was bc of the reviews and bc an aunt recommended it to me plus it was close to my home but honestly idk how this doctor has almost a 5 star. Outrageous!!! Worst place ever!!! There just horrible they probably rate themselves a five star or maybe people that live in the building that just walk downstairs.  No point of stressing :-/

originalText.text:
It’s insane that you call this place to book an appointment for your child but they only take walk ins ok no problem I just did that and oh you have to call in to speak to the dr and then book an appointment. So which one is it ??? Staff very busy hidden under the reception desk on their phones.
Never again !!!!

originalText.text: Dont know why so many haters...This is the best pediatrician in New York..Forget about secretaries, just know u will never find another one like him. problem solved...
